events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request which has been categorized appropriately as Refund.
Assigning this refund case to our dedicated customer support agent specialized in return processing.
Hello! I understand you want to request a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can proceed quickly?
My order number is 12345678. The product arrived damaged and is unusable, so I want my money back immediately.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days and will send you a confirmation email shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for your quick response and for making the refund process easy.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please check your email for the refund confirmation and details.
Following up to ensure you received your refund and that there are no further questions or concerns.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us if you need additional help.
